website_summaries.verdict: The Black & Decker 6 Quart pressure cooker does the job, but the Crock-Pot Express and Instant Pot Duo do more and are better deals.
pros: The Black & Decker 6 Quart Pressure Cooker uses pressure to speed up cooking times
It has many preset modes for specific foods, and functions as a skillet, slow cooker, rice cooker and steamer
cons: You can't adjust its pressure settings or browning heat levels
It lacks presets for yogurt, porridge and eggs

customer_reviews.title: YOU’VE GOT TO HAVE THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where can I start? This is my ever present companion at meal time!!! We are full time RV’ers and when we acquire a new cooking appliance, it is a big deal because we have no room for things that aren’t necessary. But, this is necessary! I have made fall-off-the-bone ribs, pot roast, steamed fish in foil, veggies, chicken and dumplings, and on and on, and the results were far superior to ny other way I have made these things!!! I love the pressure cooker, and I have used the slow cooker, and it works well, too. It sears the meat prior to cooking so that you truly have a one-pot wonder!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We loved it until it stopped working properly
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas, and he started cooking with it right away. We loved it until it stopped working properly, after just three months of use. I guess we got a lemon. :( Update: Customer service quickly sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: MAW

customer_reviews.title: Read the safety instructions before pressure cooking
customer_reviews.text: I have not used all the options on this, but bought it as a slow cooker. I wanted something with a lid so it would not spill. Note that this cooker weighs 1/4 as much as slow cookers the same size. It cooks just as well as a slow cooker and I have used it multiple times. I have used the pressure cook only once because we needed food done before it would be done on the slow cooker setting. It did 1 hour of cooking in 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Henderson

customer_reviews.title: YOU'VE GOTTA GET ONE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my pressure cooker...I can cook dinner for my family in a fraction of the time...I especially love the delay start. I can set it to start before I get home from work and it is ready when we get there for a great home cooked meal. AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Wish I had purchased a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love. I waited awhile on getting the instapot cause I just wasn’t sold on reviews. This has been life changer. We eat out much less because of how easy this is to use. And the quality/taste of the food has been amazing. Even the hubby who doesn’t like chicken will now eat chicken because it retains its flavor and mosurure.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Wagner 🐬🏰🐡🐳😊🐩🐕🐈🐀🐣🐇🐴🛀🏡🎼🎹👚💄👑👓👢🎓👡👠👛💰👙👒👘👗👞👟📴🅰💯

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the only thing I wish it had was the option to change the pressure setting (low-med-high). Instead it’s just one pressure, which I believe is considered the high pressure, at least that’s how I’ve been using it. Does what it want it to and has lots of room for me! I’ve made chicken and potatoes all in one pot, or a full rack of ribs! All in all I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Josica Koopman

customer_reviews.title: Beyond in love with this to be able to use in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Beyond in love with this to be able to use in my kitchen! We are using it 3-4 times a week and it has made a huge change in our cooking at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jochen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The inner pot started peeling after a few uses. It's under warranty so I called to get a replacement sent. That was 5 months ago and I haven't received anything or heard back from them since. I had to buy one so the purchase wouldn't be completely useless. I don't think I'll be purchasing Black and Decker again after this.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS kitchen amazingness
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really know how I lived without this. My soups and stews taste the best ever and I don’t have to babysit them.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't perform as advertised
customer_reviews.text: From day 1, the pressure cooker portion took a long time to get up to pressure cooker temperature, sometimes more than 30 minutes. Recently, the slow cooker function barely got the food warm. After 8 hours carrots weren't done in a pot roast. Customer Service described this as "normal" and offered to send a slow cooker "designed for slow cooking". Really? Why is there a butoon for slow cooking then? Unbelievable on so many levels. I'll never by a B&D product agin, and will post a youtube video of this units destruction online.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Love that I can make meals in 30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Espy1911

customer_reviews.title: So slow
customer_reviews.text: I have read and reread the directions and as a slow cooker this product is one of the worse. I have tried twice to cook a meal on "high" slow cooker setting and 6 hours later it is barely warm. As a pressure cooker it is mediocre. I don't have the pkg to return, but I will go back to the wolfgang puck pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Christine  McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, but limited timer function
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I have been able to follow most instapot recipes in this cooker with very little difficulty. The features all seem pretty comparable, and the instruction booklet is very clear and easy to understand. The only thing that bothers me is that I can't seem to program the manual cook for longer than an hour; makes roasts a bit more complex, as they typically must cook for longer. But overall I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: but this item is really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of anything kitchen, but this item is really easy to use. Be sure to get the nonstick bowl, easy and fast clean up as well. I have done a pork loin, cabbage, and spaghetti sauce so far.
customer_reviews.author: joc

customer_reviews.title: Good cheaper version of instant pot
customer_reviews.text: Really good product and cheaper than the instant pot. I have one of these and a Cosori brand. In all honesty I’d recommend the Cosori over this one as it comes with a glass lid for when your not using the pressure cooker function and I find the Cosori a little easier to use. Still a great little machine.
customer_reviews.author: Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Gets my husband to cook!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this!! He thinks it’s amazing. I love that it gets him to cook lol.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooking pot because of so many rave reviews as to its efficiency. Of the things I have cooked so far, none have been very special and some have been awful. Perhaps there is a learning curve which I haven't bridged yet. The product was not a worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.author: sirrab

customer_reviews.title: Love the instapot until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I really love the concept of the instant pot but I’m constantly having issues with it not pressurizing. Super frustrating to have to constantly plus and unplug the machine. Also the little thing doesn’t pop, we have to help it pot to stop the steam from releasing. I’ve contacted Black and Decker, let’s see if the remedy the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a real time saver. It has all the bells and whistles but is not so complicated that you need a Ph.D. to operate it. It also has a small footprint, meaning it won't eat up your counter space. You could spend more, but this one should do just about everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: William Theodore Clemmons

customer_reviews.title: you have to have one of these
customer_reviews.text: If your life is as hectic as mine, this pressure cooker is a God send. Whip up a meal in less than hour. Great for when family comes to visit. You don't have to spend all your time in the kitchen. enjoy your family and then a perfect home cooked meal. Enjoy the extra time you will have.. this is really a life saver.

customer_reviews.text: Got it fast and works very well. I'll get another one soon to cook things that have different cook times.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be afraid to use this pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes quick order of meals. Don’t know how I ever did without it!

customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to my kitchen! So easy to use. Great pressure cooking. Easy, non-stick cleaning.

customer_reviews.text: I is very useful but guide paper is not easy to use

customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and I love it! it's really easy to operate and the meals I've made have come out great.

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I got my Black and Decker instant pot and read the manual very carefully. When I tried to use it I followed the instructions but it did not work. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Walton

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum not Stainless Steel.
customer_reviews.text: Miss leading advertising. This pressure cooker is not stainless steel, it’s aluminum. I couldn’t care less that the shell of the pressure cooker is stainless steel. Nothing in your advertising describes the cooking pot in any way so advertising stainless steel is miss leading. You don’t deserve one star, I wish a zero was possible.
customer_reviews.author: Ridge Runner

customer_reviews.title: Be Patient.
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected to be & do. Just need patience though! Love how it cooks rice & chicken breast just right! I would recommend this product!

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a year
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working within a year of purchase. Very disappointed with this.

customer_reviews.title: I like it, it has many functions
customer_reviews.text: I like it,it has many functions. I usually use rice meat and slow cook. It save me a lot of time. The only problem is it is not easy to clean after cooked meat. There is some meet smells when I use it for rice.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Replaces my pressure cooker and my slow cooker. You definitely dont want to use this for canning unless your doing little pint jars. But for everyday cooking its amazing!

customer_reviews.title: good unit for the price

customer_reviews.title: The lady that cooks for me is vey happy with programable Black-Decker
customer_reviews.text: The lady that cooks for me is vey happy with programable Black-Decker. She uses for everything now, from meat to a simple white rice. Fantastic!

customer_reviews.title: Ain't No Instapot
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this appliance. I bought this thinking Black and Decker would make a solid product. I was wrong. We made chili last night and in 40 minutes it never actually pressurized. We spoke with customer service on the phone and still werent able to resolve. Also, there is only one setting for Browning which made it difficult to time meats vs veggies. Finally, the manual in general is a complete POS. 2 ivy leaguers couldn't make quick sense of it. And there are no online tutorials or guide. In summary, terrible product and made us think twice about ever buying Black and Decker again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Graham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small family
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a family of 4. Used it to make the perfect pot of sticky rice the first day we got it. We love that it doubles as a crock pot / slow cooker. This one item has replaced our rice cooker/veggie steamer and serves as a 2nd crock pot for when the whole family gets together. We have yet to use all of the settings, but I have no doubt they will work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny D

customer_reviews.title: It is fantastic. The only problem was that I was cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pot all but two days since I received it. It is fantastic. The only problem was that I was cooking veges too long. two minutes suffice instead of three for that application . Unlike the first pot that I returned ( different brand ) this one works exactly as it is supposed to and is a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Kale

customer_reviews.title: What took us so long??
customer_reviews.text: So, we were slow to jump on the pressure cooker bandwagon... and now we wish we had done so sooner!! After a lot of research I decided on the Black & Decker PR100, and it has been a GAME CHANGER. So easy to use, and now even exhausted at the end of a long workday my husband and I can still make an amazing dinner in a fraction of the time it would take us with any other appliance. And the non-stick inner pot makes cleanup sooooo easy. We love this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: crazy4disney

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome pressure cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this pressure cooker! I use it weekly to boil a dozen eggs for my breakfast and use it for beans, stew and chicken. The unit has a large pot and I watched a ton of youtube videos for recipe ideas. My favorite food to cook in it is macaroni and cheese. Cleans up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: B&D 6 qt cooking pot. Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to cook steel-cut oatmeal. Set it at "White rice" and cook for 15 minutes. Perfect! The only thing to pay attention to is the water level can not be too low. I always make sure the water is one inch deep so the pressure can build up when there is enough steam. Another thing one has to be careful is that when open the lid, make sure you wear padded glove so that you won't get burned. I love this product. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: snaht

customer_reviews.title: but this is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used to be afraid of using a pressure cooker, but this is easy to use, makes almost no sounds and works like a charm. It's my "new best friend".
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Just get it!
customer_reviews.text: Having used to pressure cooking the traditional way, this electric pressure cooker is excellent. While I'm still getting used to figuring out the cooking time vs the old way, the nonstick cooker just makes everything so much easier. This pressure cooker is also silent as it doesn't hiss like the traditional pressure cooker. If it hasn't been because of the digital timer, I would have thought it wasn't even on.
customer_reviews.author: aultraman

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pressure cooker and I LOVE IT!! I use it to mainly cook chili, stews, soups, and rice. The pot is large enough to make enough portions for dinner and have a few to put away in the freezer. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Baja Mama

customer_reviews.title: one of the best purchases I made on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday. the browning option is superb. one of the best purchases I made on amazon. makes white rice in 15 mins! and for slow cooking and pressure cooking works like a charm! very quite it does take around 5 mins to warm up. Very easy to clean and maintain and user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Zalzaly

customer_reviews.title: Great addtion to your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My favorite purchase of last year, I have not encountered one negative thing about it. Bean making machine! Soup mofo! Love this thing.

customer_reviews.title: I've used this a few times and I really like it. The only complaint I have is it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times and I really like it. The only complaint I have is it seems the recommended times in the cookbook it comes with are deceiving since it takes 20-30 minutes after cooking to "cooldown" and release the pressure on its own (most meat recipes state to do this). What I will say, is that steamed vegetables come out PERFECT right around 11 minutes with 1 cup of water and a little butter in there. It's also very easy to clean and reassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Love using this cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love using this cooker. Actually much better than I even expected. Have not even tried all the features but what I have used work great. So nice to produce a meal that would normally take hours in just a few minutes and have it come out so great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the Instapots....
customer_reviews.text: I compared this to the instapot and figured I'd give this one a shot. So far everything has been great with it over the past year. It's easy to use and there are 100s of recipes online to use with it. It's super easy to make soups and stews, I've made rice, ribs and all sorts of chicken dishes. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to jump in the pressure cooker domain...
customer_reviews.author: Happy Family

customer_reviews.title: Love this pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. I now use this to cook just about everything. Cooks very fast and everything cooks great. Definitely one of the best purchases I have ever made.

customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Everything tastes so good out of here.

customer_reviews.text: Love this! It saves me so much time and I don't have to think ahead as much. I am learning though you can't cook everything in there...my husband says, "It's good, but please cook in something else once in a while!"

customer_reviews.text: Took a lot longer than I expected as I didn’t figure in the time it took to get up to pressure .

customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 as gifts and they absolutely love them.

Being a vegetarian I questioned whether I would use it very much, but I do. In fact, I have a lot of fun looking for things I can pressure cook!

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER 6 quart 11-in-1 Cooking Pot, Stainless Steel, Pressure Cooker, Slow Cooker, Multi-Cooker, PR100
product_meta.description:
Turn up the pressure for faster cook times*! The BLACK+DECKER 7-in-1 6-Quart Electric Pressure Cooker gets your favorite meals to the table in an instant by sealing in heat, steam, and flavor throughout the cooking process. Choose from 7 dedicated pressure functions to make all your favorites with one pot convenience: rice, beans, meats, soups, stews, and plenty more. You can even sear meat with the browning function before pressure cooking it to perfection and adding in other ingredients. Other non-pressure functions include traditional slow cooking (high and low) and keeping food warm. Safety is a priority with this pressure cooker, and it’s designed with 9 independent safety checks to ensure the unit works correctly and safely every time. Plus, the digital controls and delay timer make it easy to select the exact function and time you desire. You like fast cooking, right? How does fast cleanup sound?! The nonstick cooking pot is dishwasher-safe and so are the included accessories: trivet, rice-measuring cup, and nonstick-friendly serving spoon. Also included is a recipe book packed with delicious meals designed especially for one pot pressure cooking. Get ready to save time in the kitchen! The BLACK+DECKER 7-in-1 6-Quart Electric Pressure Cooker is the perfect way to make delicious food fast!

*vs BLACK+DECKER toaster ovens and standard slow cookers.
feature_bullets: Faster Cooking! - Pressure cooking gets dinner on the table faster*! Enjoy the full flavor of all your favorites in a fraction of the time

7-in-1 Cooking Pot - The 7 dedicated pressure cooker functions make it easy to prepare a variety of foods in an instant*. Functions include: white rice, brown rice, beans, meat, steaming, soup, and manual programming
4 Non-Pressure Functions - Go beyond pressure-cooking for even more one pot meals with settings for traditional slow cooking (high or low heat), browning, and keeping food warm
9 Added Safety Features - Carefully designed with a system of safety checks for peace of mind every time you use the pressure cooker

Cookbook and Accessories Included - Delicious recipes designed specifically for the pressure cooker. Plus: trivet, rice-measuring cup, and nonstick-friendly serving spoon. Included Components: (1) Trivet, (1) Rice-measuring cup, (1) Non-stick cooking bowl, (1) Non-stick serving spoon

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars188 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
